column1: Ambar-metta is the Quenya term that refers to the End of the World.
It is mostly known as was part of a line used by Elendil upon his arrival to Middle-earth
column2: declaring "Out of the Belegaer to Middle-earth I am come. In this place will I abide
column4: unto the ending of the Arda". Aragorn would later use this line at his Coronation of Elessar.

column3: is a composition of two Quenya words
